casebody.data:
Wednesday, February 6, 2002

MERIT DOCKET

01-1490. Estate of Monahan v. Am. States Ins. Co.

Certified State Law Question, No. 500CV1191. On copy of order vacating certification of state law questions by United States District Court, Northern District of Ohio, and on motion to dismiss of Fireman’s Fund Insurance Company. Motion to dismiss sustained. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
